description: This table contains information on including charge count in authorization for Hospital Billing temporary transactions.

columns.name: HTT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: INCL_IN_AUTH_CHG_CNT_YN
columns.description:
This item indicates whether the charge line contributes to the used count of the authorization linked to it.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes
